group.name: sql2
group.cmd: select COUNT(*) from TAH_DONEM where donem=#donem

group.name: sql1
group.cmd: select /* + parallel(x,16) */ COUNT(*) as CDR from ARC_CDR_RAW_DATA x where process_date like'#yesterday%' and donem=#prevDonem
select /* + parallel(x,16) */ COUNT(*) as TOPLAM, NOTIFICATION_TYPE, EVENT_TYPE from ARC_ABONE_BILDIRIM x where NOTIFICATION_DATE LIKE '#yesterday%' GROUP BY EVENT_TYPE, NOTIFICATION_TYPE
